Constructors

UserManager()

Initializes a new instance of the UserManager class and all it's properties.

public UserManager()

Remarks

Sets Service to the newly created UserService object, SelectedItem to first object of service's collection and MergedFileManager to the newly created MergedFileManager object.

Methods

Create(int)

Asks user for login and password and creates new user based on the input.

public bool Create(int connectedItemId = 0)

Parameters

connectedItemId int

The value of this parameter doesn't matter in this implementation. It has set default value, so it can be omitted all together.

Returns

bool

true if new entity was successfully created; otherwise false.

Remarks

Created user is added to collection and selected item is set to it.
